label: Authority
comment: The authority under which a conformity claim is issued.  For example a national accrediation authority may accredit a test lab to issue test certificates about a product against a standard.

datatypeProperties.comment: The competent authority that issued the accreditation.
The pointer to the credential issued by a trust anchor that accredits the party making the assessment.
A code specifying the accreditaiotn evidence type (eg VC, web page, DAKKS seal)
The reference number for the accreditation - issued by the accreditation body (AB) to the confomrity assessment body (CAB)
The trust mark that represents the conformity assessment scheme.

referencedBy.comment: The accreditation that from a competent authority (ag NATA) that confirms the issuers authorised scope of assessments.
The regulatory approval under which this conformity attestation is issued.
